snippet: Last evening the doors of Old Tammany were thrown open, and the Democracy called together for the purpose of ratifying the nominations of State officers made at the Syracuse Convention. A large platform had been erected at one and of the hall, ove...
lead_paragraph: Last evening the doors of Old Tammany were thrown open, and the Democracy called together for the purpose of ratifying the nominations of State officers made at the Syracuse Convention. A large platform had been erected at one and of the hall, over which was a large banner, which bore the following inscription:

headline.main: OPENING OF THE CAMPAIGN.; Democratic Ratification Meeting at Tammany Hall.
